name: Latitude 40 Consulting, Inc.
tagline: Software designed for the way you do business
description:
~~About Latitude 40
Companies rely on Latitude 40 Consulting to help them realize their business visions.  We help enterprises make the most of their investments by using best-practices methodology to tailor comprehensive business solutions – solutions that can grow as you grow and change as the business changes… without costly re-engineering.  This gives the maximum return on investment and best total cost of ownership.
